params.name: eventType
params.description: A string representing the event type to listen for.

params.name: listener
params.description: The function that receives a notification.

params.name: options
params.description: An options object that specifies characteristics about the event listener

params.name: options.capture
params.description:
Indicating that events will be dispatched
before being dispatched to any EventTarget it in the DOM tree.

params.name: options.passive
params.description: Indicating that the listener will never call `event.preventDefault()`.

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "@dlghq/dialog-utils",
  "version": "0.9.0",
  "description": "A collection of utility libraries used by Dialog projects.",
  "main": "src/index.js",
  "files": [
    "src",
    "lib"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "pretest": "eslint src/ && flow check",
    "test": "jest",
    "predocs": "rimraf docs/",
    "docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json",
    "postdocs": "gh-pages-deploy",
    "preversion": "npm test",
    "postversion": "npm run release",
    "postpublish": "git push --follow-tags",
    "release": "npm publish",
    "postrelease": "npm run docs"
  },
  "repository": "git@github.com:dialogs/dialog-js-utils.git",
  "author": "Nikita Gusakov <gusnkt@gmail.com>",
  "contributors": [
    {
      "name": "Oleg Shilov",
      "email": "me@olegshilov.com",
      "url": "https://github.com/olegshilov"
    }
  ],
  "license": "Apache-2.0",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@dlghq/babel-preset-dialog": "3.4.2",
    "@dlghq/eslint-config-dialog": "3.3.2",
    "babel-core": "6.26.0",
    "esdoc": "1.0.4",
    "esdoc-flow-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "eslint": "4.18.2",
    "flow-bin": "0.66.0",
    "gh-pages-deploy": "^0.4.2",
    "jest-cli": "22.4.2",
    "rimraf": "2.6.2"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "immutable": "3.8.2",
    "lodash": "4.17.5"
  },
  "gh-pages-deploy": {
    "staticpath": "docs"
  }
}
name: package.json
